articles.title: Delegation of Special Envoy of S. Korean President Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Special Envoy of S. Korean President Here
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- A delegation of special envoy of the south Korean president, including Jong Ui Yong, chief of the State Security Office of Chongwadae, arrived here Monday.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Inspects Metal Industrial Establishments in North Hamgyong Province
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Inspects Metal Industrial Establishments in North Hamgyong Province
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, inspected metal industrial establishments in North Hamgyong Province.
					 Officials and workers at the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, the Musan Mining Complex, the Chongjin Steel Plant, and the Puryong Ferroalloy Factory are waging a high-pitched drive to increase the production with a single determination to support the Party by producing more iron and steel and concentrated iron ore.
					
					 Inspecting the metal industrial units in the province, the premier gave pep talks to the officials and workers taking the lead in making a breakthrough in building a powerful socialist country.
					
					 There took place consultative meetings on the spot, at which measures were taken to further perfect the Juche-oriented iron and steel making technologies and boost the production of iron and solve the problems arising in putting the concentrated iron ore production at the Musan Mining Complex on a normal footing.
					
					 He also went round the Chongjin Theatre under construction to discuss the ways of completing the construction at the best level.

articles.title: GFTUK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
GFTUK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) led by Kim Tong Son, vice-chairman of its Central Committee, Monday returned home after attending the meeting of the Presidential Council of the World Federation of Trade Unions held in Iran.

articles.title: DPRK Wins Another Gold Medal in 2018 Asian Wrestling Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Wins Another Gold Medal in 2018 Asian Wrestling Championship
Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- DPRK wrestler Kang Kum Song won a gold medal in the 2018 Asian Wrestling Championship.
					 In men's freestyle wrestling 57 kg category, Kang defeated his south Korean rival in the quarterfinals and Japanese rival in the semifinals.
					
					 He trounced his Uzbek rival in the finals on February 3.

articles.title: Centenarian Receives Birthday Spread
articles.content:
Centenarian Receives Birthday Spread
 Yonsa, March 5 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to Song Phil Son, a woman centenarian living in Sampho-ri, Yonsa County of North Hamgyong Province.
					 Born as a daughter of a poor peasant family in Orang County of North Hamgyong Province during the period of the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists, she experienced the sorrow of being a member of the stateless nation.
					
					 It was not until President Kim Il Sung liberated Korea that she could live a genuine and happy life
					
					 She devoted herself to performing her revolutionary duty in the past. After becoming a pensioner, she leads her life optimistically, keeping herself busy. 
					
					 She always tells her children to work hard for the grateful party and country, saying that she lives long thanks to the best socialist system in the world.

articles.title: Rotating Trophy Awarded to Taesongsan Sports Team
articles.content:
Rotating Trophy Awarded to Taesongsan Sports Team
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The rotating trophy was awarded to the Taesongsan Sports Team that took the first place in the Paektusan Prize Sports Games held from Feb. 1 to 27 in the DPRK.
					 Its players bagged 55 medals in total, including 23 out of over 70 gold medals at the games.
					
					 Especially, the team gained dominance in winter sports events by securing the first place in men's and women's ice hockey, winning 8 gold medals in speed skating and producing medalists in men's and women's 500-meter, 1,000-meter and 1,500-meter short track speed skating, men's 5,000m relay staking, women's individual figure skating, ice dancing and other events.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Sapling Production
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Sapling Production
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The Central Tree Nursery under the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection in the DPRK has made achievements in sapling production.
					 The tree nursery ensures the healthy growth of saplings with efficacious slow-acting fertilizer, saving a large amount of fertilizer.
					
					 It also settled sci-tech problems in watering all nursery gardens with a pump and thus reduced the cost of sapling production.
					
					 And it established the new methods of exterminating harmful insects with biological pesticide, producing substrates and shortening the date of their fermentation, all of which are of great significance in putting the sapling production on a scientific, industrial and intensive basis.
					
					 On the basis of achievements made in the research into seasonless tree planting, it generalizes throughout the country tree planting and cultivation methods proper to the climatic features of the country.
					
					 According to chief engineer Pak Tong Rim, the nursery has produced tens of millions of good species of saplings every year and acclimatized over 70 kinds of trees.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Confrontational Act of S. Korean Conservatives
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Confrontational Act of S. Korean Conservatives 
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The "Liberal Korea Party" (LKP) group including Hong Jun Phyo and Kim Mu Song staged disgusting confrontational farce while talking about "sinking of 'Cheonan' warship" and "bombing" as regards the south Korean visit by the DPRK's high-ranking delegation.
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Monday brands the wild act of the south Korean conservative group as an intolerable provocation to the DPRK's efforts and measures for national concord and the improvement of the north-south relations, and a hysterical fit to get rid of the crisis of destruction.
					
					 It is utterly shocking for the conservatives including those of the LKP to kick up the racket even by faulting the DPRK high-ranking delegation's south Korea visit, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 It is the elementary etiquette of human being to respond to good faith in kind. But the south Korean conservative maniacs slandered the guests who came to congratulate their feast, going rude and ill-mannered.
					
					 They only nurture dirty political ambition, being indifferent to the destiny of the nation and peace and reunification of the country.
					
					 The south Korean conservative hooligans kicked up the racket of confrontation against the south Korea visit of the DPRK's high-ranking delegation by taking issue with the hackneyed case of "Cheonan" warship sinking, only to disclose their disgusting nature dead-set against the reunification of the country, and to provoke laughter of the world people.
					
					 It is shame on the nation that a handful of confrontational maniacs and dirty human rejects are still agitating the world.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Trump Group's Moves for Ramping Up Sanctions on DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Trump Group's Moves for Ramping Up Sanctions on DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The U.S. recently worked out another "independent sanctions" by which it included 56 objects including maritime and trade companies, vessels and individuals of the DPRK and third countries within the "list of specified sanctions" while calling for "cutting off the line financing nuclear and missile development". It even made public "international transport advice", saying that individuals and marine transport companies which are involved in sea trade with the DPRK can be subject to sanctions imposed by the U.S.
					 The recent despicable additional sanctions farce staged by the Trump group is a gangster-like act aimed to totally check the legitimate foreign trade of a sovereign state, and another vicious provocation violating the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun in a commentary Monday. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The wild act of the Trump group is nothing but a last-ditch struggle of those who sustained a bitter defeat in the DPRK-U.S. decades-long nuclear standoff.
					
					 The DPRK turned itself into a great power, world-level military giant looked up by the world, while resolutely foiling the U.S. most barbarous and gangster-like toughest sanctions and pressure with the might of single-minded unity and the self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 The U.S. must clearly understand the strategic position of the DPRK and behave with reason, thinking about an option that meets its interests.
					
					 If the U.S. and its vassal forces violate even a bit the sovereignty of the DPRK while clamoring for "sea blockade" and "cutting off financing line", that will incur strong countermeasures.
					
					 The U.S. has to stop senseless and thoughtless act and make realistic thinking and judgment suited to the trend of the times.

articles.title: Demo Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Demo Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- More than 1 000 south Koreans from all walks of life held a demonstration in the Tapgol Park of Seoul on Mar. 1, the 99th anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising, to demand the Japanese government make an apology and reparation for its past aggression, according to the south Korean online paper Voice of People.
					 Taking part in the demo were inhabitants from Seoul, Pusan, Ryosu, Jindo, Kwangyang and other parts of south Korea.
					
					 Arriving at the statue of girl sexual slave near the Japanese embassy in Seoul, the demonstrators chanted slogans more loudly and urged the Japanese authorities to make an official apology and reparation for the past crimes.
					
					 Then they continued to march to the U.S. embassy and the Kwanghwamun plaza.

articles.title: S. Korean Birthrate at All-time Low
articles.content:
S. Korean Birthrate at All-time Low 
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- A birthrate of south Korea, which has already reached an all-time low in the world, is becoming more deplorable, according to the south Korean MBC on March 1.
					 The birthrate in south Korea hit the lowest point in the world in 2000, shocking the international community.
					
					 Notably, the number of births in 2017 decreased by 11 percent compared to what was in 2016.
					
					 Prospect of birthrate looks gloomier, the broadcasting service noted and attributed this to the sharp decrease in marriage, the young joblessness hitting an all time-low and sky-rocketing housing rent.

articles.title: 5th Meeting of 23rd Central Committee of Chongryon Held
articles.content:
5th Meeting of 23rd Central Committee of Chongryon Held
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The 5th meeting of the 23rd Central Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) was held at the Central Hall of Chongryon in Tokyo on March 2.
					 Among those present there were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, Nam Sung U and Pae Ik Ju, its vice-chairmen, Pae Jin Gu, its vice-chairman and concurrently director general of the General Affairs Department, Kang Chu Ryon, its vice-chairwoman and chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Democratic Korean Women in Japan, Hong In Hum, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon, directors and advisers of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, the director of the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan and members of the Central Committee and the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon.
					
					 Ho Jong Man made a report on the first agenda item "On Greeting the 24th Congress of Chongryon as Occasion for Making Decisive Breakthrough for the Development of Movement of Koreans in Japan in the Great Kim Jong Un's Era".
					
					 Then the floor was taken by Kim Sang Il, chairman of the Kyoto Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, Ri Sang Sok, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Atachi branch of Chongryon, Ri Pak Ji, chairman of the Toshun branch, Aichi Prefecture, of Chongryon, Ri Jong Man, managing director of the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, Kim Yong Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, Pu Jong Saeng, chairwoman of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of the Union of Democratic Korean Women in Japan, and Jo Su Rae, chairman of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Hyogo Prefecture, who are members of the Central Committee of Chongryon.
					
					 Vice-Chairman Nam Sung U made a report on the second agenda item "On Convening the 24th Congress of Chongryon".
					
					 Decisions on agenda items discussed were adopted at the meeting.
					
					 A report on the examination of qualifications was made and there were dismissal and by-election of some members of the Central Committee.
					
					 A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from 5th Meeting of 23rd Central Committee of Chongryon
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from 5th Meeting of 23rd Central Committee of Chongryon
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants in the 5th meeting of the 23rd Central Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on March 2.
					 The letter noted that the participants in the meeting discussed and decided to convene the 24th Congress of Chongryon and glorify it as the one of glory and loyalty building a new landmark for the development of the movement of Koreans in Japan in the great Kim Jong Un's era by intensifying the struggle to make a decisive breakthrough in the development of the movement centering on branches, forefront units for the patriotic movement, true to the noble idea and intention clarified by the Supreme Leader in his New Year message.
					
					 They are full of determination to display loyalty to trust and follow Marshal Kim Jong Un only at the congress, the first of its kind after holding him in high esteem as the chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, and strikingly manifest once again the true picture of Chongryon which has achieved single-hearted unity of the ranks and the harmonious whole of the compatriots all over the world and build a new landmark in the sacred path for the development and strengthening of the patriotic movement of Chongryon, it said.
					
					 They will further strengthen Chongryon into ranks of single-hearted unity and harmonious whole in which the Juche ideological system and leadership system have been firmly established, and into invincible ranks with iron discipline and militancy, the letter said, adding:
					
					 We will make tangible contributions to the building of a powerful socialist country by sharing the same breath and same footstep with the people in the homeland who are bringing into a brilliant reality the great General's patriotic desire for a powerful country this significant year marking the 70th birthday of the DPRK.
					
					 The letter stressed that they would fulfill their mission and patriotic duty before the country and the nation in the nationwide movement for opening up a breakthrough for the independent reunification, true to the policy for great change in the north-south relations and epoch-making measures of the Supreme Leader who gave bright joy and delight of the independent reunification of the country to all the Koreans and moved the whole world.

articles.title: 39th Meeting of Union of Korean Students in Japan Held
articles.content:
39th Meeting of Union of Korean Students in Japan Held
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The 39th meeting of the Union of Korean Students in Japan took place at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Feb. 27.
					 Present at the meeting were Han Tong Song, director of the organization department of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Kim Hyon Il, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Students in Japan, and other deputies.
					
					 Kim Hyon Il in his report referred to the achievements of the union in the work for implementing the patriotic tasks of Chongryon and for branch-expanding, science research and talent-training, etc. after the 38th meeting.
					
					 He stressed the need to strengthen the ideological education among Korean students in Japan so that they may keep pace with the socialist homeland and to make a decisive breach in the drive for developing the movement of the union on a higher stage this year greeting the 70th birthday of the DPRK and the 24th Congress of Chongryon.
					
					 He said that all the branches of the union should be cemented as reliable citadel stones of patriotism and its organizations should be expanded and a radical progress made in the work for training talents to realize the "2018 plan of the Union of Korean Students in Japan".
					
					 Speeches were made before the results of the "2017 movement for creating new history of the Union of Korean Students in Japan" were announced. Citations were awarded to the best headquarters and branch of the union.
					
					 Kim Hyon Il was reelected chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Students in Japan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Germany
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The Azzawi Media Print in Berlin of Germany brought out in booklet leader Kim Jong Il's work "On the Fundamentals of Revolutionary Party Building" on February 14 on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, his birth anniversary.
					 The work, published on October 10, Juche 81 (1992), deals with the historic lesson of building a socialist ruling party and the fundamental principle of building a revolutionary party of Juche and clarifies the idea of strengthening the internationalist unity and solidarity among the revolutionary parties.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed in Russia
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Celebration meetings, seminars and lectures were held by political parties, organizations and institutions of Russia in the period between February 4 and 20 to mark the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia said:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il is the great general, true patriot and defender of justice and peace.
					
					 He devoted all his life to the people.
					
					 His tender-hearted image will be kept deep in our hearts as he was possessed of boundless devotion, ardent patriotism and warm humanity.
					
					 The first secretary of the C.C., All-Russia Lenin Young Communist League stressed that Kim Jong Il is the great leader who turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological and military power.
					
					 The chairperson of the Branch of the Republic of Altay of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea lauded the ideo-theoretical exploits of Kim Jong Il who enriched and developed the immortal Juche idea into the guiding idea in the era of independence to clearly indicate the road ahead of the progressive mankind.
					
					 The chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea introduced the Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il, praising him as a genuine leader of the people and a prominent statesman.
					
					 The first secretary of the C.C., Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation said that Kim Jong Il devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people, always finding himself among them.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the C.C., Communist Party "Russian Communists", the chairman of the Regional Social Organization of Russia "Borozino", the principal of the 11th Middle School in Khabarovsk City, the daughter of Ya. T. Nobichenko, an internationalist soldier, and other speakers lauded the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il who performed the immortal exploits before the times and history and had been boundlessly revered by all people for his noble personality.
					
					 Meanwhile, a seminar on the exploits of Kim Jong Il took place at the Communist Party of the Soviet Union.

articles.title: Arriba a Pyongyang la delegacion del enviado especial del presidente surcoreano
articles.content:
Arriba a Pyongyang la delegacion del enviado especial del presidente surcoreano
Pyongyang, 5 de marzo (ACNC) -- Llegaron el dia 5 a esta capital el jefe de la Oficina de Seguridad Nacional de Chongwadae, Jong Ui Yong, y otros integrantes de la delegacion del enviado especial del presidente surcoreano.
